00024 
00025 MemoryMap::MemoryMap(QDomNode &memoryMapNode): name_(), id_(), items_(),
00026 addressUnitBits_(0) {
00027         for (int i = 0; i < memoryMapNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00028 
00029                 QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = memoryMapNode.attributes();
00030                 id_ = attributeMap.namedItem("spirit:id").nodeValue();
00031                 id_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(id_);
00032 
00033                 QDomNode tempNode = memoryMapNode.childNodes().at(i);
00034 
00035                 // get name
00036                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00037                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00038                         name_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(name_);
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 // get addressUnitBits
00042                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressUnitBits")) {
00043                         addressUnitBits_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00044                 }
00045 
00046                 // get SubSpaceMap
00047                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:subspaceMap")) {
00048                         SubspaceMap *temp = new SubspaceMap(tempNode);
00049                         items_.append(QSharedPointer<SubspaceMap>(temp));
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 // get Bank
00053                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:bank")) {
00054                         Bank *temp = new Bank(tempNode);
00055                         items_.append(QSharedPointer<Bank>(temp));
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 // get addressBlock
00059                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressBlock")) {
00060                         AddressBlock *temp = new AddressBlock(tempNode);
00061                         items_.append(QSharedPointer<AddressBlock>(temp));
00062                 }
00063         }
00064 
00065         // if mandatory element name is missing
00066         if (name_.isNull()) {
00067                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name is missing in"
00068                                 " spirit:memoryMap"));
00069         }
00070         return;
00071 }
00072 
00073 MemoryMap::MemoryMap( const MemoryMap &other ):
00074 name_(other.name_),
00075 id_(other.id_),
00076 items_(),
00077 addressUnitBits_(other.addressUnitBits_) {
00078 
00079         foreach (QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> item, other.items_) {
00080                 if (item) {
00081                         QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00082                                 new MemoryMapItem(*item.data()));
00083                         items_.append(copy);
00084                 }
00085         }
00086 }
00087 
00088 MemoryMap & MemoryMap::operator=( const MemoryMap &other ) {
00089         if (this != &other) {
00090                 name_ = other.name_;
00091                 id_ = other.id_;
00092                 addressUnitBits_ = other.addressUnitBits_;
00093                 
00094                 items_.clear();
00095                 foreach (QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> item, other.items_) {
00096                         if (item) {
00097                                 QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00098                                         new MemoryMapItem(*item.data()));
00099                                 items_.append(copy);
00100                         }
00101                 }
00102         }
00103         return *this;
00104 }
00105 
00106 MemoryMap::~MemoryMap() {
00107         items_.clear();
00108 }
00109 
00110 void MemoryMap::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00111         // spirit:memoryMap can't be written here because this function
00112         // is used also as spirit:localMemoryMap
00113 
00114         // if optional attribute id is defined
00115         if (!id_.isEmpty()) {
00116                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:id", id_);
00117         }
00118 
00119         // if mandatory name is missing
00120         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00121                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name is missing in spirit:"
00122                                 "memoryMap"));
00123         }
00124         else {
00125                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00126         }
00127 
00128         // write all addressblock, bank and subspaceMap elements
00129         for (int i = 0; i < items_.size(); ++i) {
00130                 items_.at(i)->write(writer);
00131         }
00132 
00133         if (addressUnitBits_ != 0) {
00134                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:addressUnitBits",
00135                                 QString::number(addressUnitBits_));
00136         }
00137 
00138 }

00141         name_ = name;
00142 }

00144 void MemoryMap::setAddressUnitBits(unsigned int addressUnitBits) {
00145         addressUnitBits_ = addressUnitBits;
00146 }

00148 const QList<QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> >& MemoryMap::getItems() {
00149         return items_;
00150 }
00151 
00152 QString MemoryMap::getName() const {
00153         return name_;

00156 unsigned int MemoryMap::getAddressUnitBits() const {
00157         return addressUnitBits_;

00160 void MemoryMap::setItems(const QList<QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> > &items) {
00161         // first delete the old items
00162         items_.clear();
00163 
00164         // save the new items
00165         items_ = items;
00166 }
